conclusion: Preliminary objection rejected (ratione temporis);Preliminary objection rejected (non-exhaustion);Preliminary objection rejected (six month period);Violation of Art. 6-3-c;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses - claim dismissed
